name: The Dry Maze
description:
The Dry Maze

Every level is new maze with some monsters.. you must clean all the maze to continue the next level....

But you have different mask to attack different monsters.. you must use the correct mask or you attack will not cause effect.

You can change the mask you keep in your pocket

MOVE: A,S,D,W

HEAD: ARROW KEYS

SHOOT: SPACE BAR

CHANGE MASK FROM POKET: Z

WORK IN PROGRESS......
